post.text: Join me in Akron, Ohio - for a few minutes! TOGETHER- WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Clark
comment.text: Is America really this delusional to believe anything out of his mouth? Make America Great? He's already alienated our allies, were in big trouble if Americans are truly stupid to believe a word this foul mouthed lier is saying? What is going on? This is so crazy. He will bring war and terrorism to our country. Looking around this room it does not look very educated, it's like watching Jerry Springer!

replies.author: Jared
replies.text: And you believe everything that comes out of Hillary's mouth? She has done nothing but lie

replies.author: Kaycee
replies.text: Oh Hillary is the one bringing terrorism.

replies.author: Clark
replies.text: Jared like I said dilutions and I never said anything about Hillary!

replies.author: Lukas
replies.text: Clark you go ahead and vote for Hilliar see how ya come out
